summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Creators Hive HQ Master Database system. All core features tested successfully including Self-Funding Loop, ARRIS Pattern Engine, Memory Palace, and Zero-Human Operational Model.

Users page displays 6 seeded users with correct roles and tiers
Calculator page shows revenue summary with Self-Funding Loop indicator active

ARRIS Engine page displays usage logs (4), performance reviews (3), training data (3) tabs
Patterns page shows pattern analysis with insights and Memory Palace comprehensive data
Schema Index page displays all sheet categories (6 categories) and primary keys
All 33 backend API endpoints return correct responses

API endpoint /api/calculator/summary returns Self-Funding Loop status as 'Active'
API endpoint /api/patterns/analyze returns pattern insights for usage, revenue, engagement
API endpoint /api/patterns/memory-palace returns comprehensive data with 3 sections
Navigation between all pages works correctly
User filtering by role and tier functions properly
Pattern type selector changes analysis correctly
Dashboard refresh functionality works

ARRIS Pattern Engine tabs (Usage, Performance, Training) all functional

success_percentage.integration: 100% (Self-Funding Loop and ARRIS Engine fully functional)
